DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect mulberry leaf extract blood glucose subject impair fast glucose .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Mulberry Leaf Extract Blood Glucose
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate effect mulberry leaf extract blood glucose subject impair fast glucose . After 2 week run-in period wash-out , subject randomly assign two group , i.e . control group ( placebo ) mulberry leaf extract group . They intake placebo mulberry leaf extract 4 week . Biomarkers analyze blood sample 0 4 week .
DOC.criteria: Age : 20 year Fasting glucose : 100mg/dl ≤ ~ ≤ 125mg/dl HbA1c : < 6.5 % Subject take medicine , Chinese medicine Health/Functional Foods affect glucose metabolism 30 day prior screen visit Subject take part clinical trial 30 day prior screen visit Subject pregnant breast feeding Subject lose body weight 4 kg 30 day prior screen visit Alcoholic Heavy smoker ( ≥ 20 cigarettes/day ) Subject heart failure , coronary artery disease , uncontrolled hypertension ( ≥ 140/90mmHg ) , diabetes ( fast blood glucose ≥ 126mg/dL ) , renal dysfunction , liver failure , hyperthyroidism , hypothyroidism , cancer mental disease Subject allergy ingredient study product
